channel.title: 10 Gig E on 0x000216

item.title: 10 Gig E WAN Comes To The Enterprise
item.description: It may seem surprising, but businesses can now access 10 Gigabit Ethernet connections for their wide area networks. What’s even more surprising is how many businesses can actually utilize this bandwidth. Gigabit Ethernet is becoming increasingly popular among large corporations and tech companies that need to manage and deliver massive amounts of data quickly. What kinds of companies are we talking about? For those involved in video production or editing, Gigabit per second connections are essential.

item.title: 10 Gbps Dedicated Internet Access Availability
item.description: By: John Shepler Previously thought to be an excessive amount of bandwidth only suitable for large telecom companies, 10 Gbps connections are quickly becoming the desired level of connectivity for businesses, local governments, medical facilities, content creators, and online retailers. The good news is this bandwidth level is now attainable at a reasonable cost. Where Can I Get 10 Gbps Dedicated Internet? 10 Gigabit Ethernet service is now commonly available in most cities due to the widespread adoption of fiber optic infrastructure.
